text: ninnale bhumiyil pratinidhikalakkiyat avanan. ninnalil cilare marru cilarekkal unnata padavikalilekk uyarttiyatum avan tanne. ninnalkk avan nalkiya kalivil ninnale pariksikkananit. sansayamilla; ninre nathan vegam siksa natapati svikarikkunnavanan. oppam ere pearukkunnavanum dayaparanum tanne
